channel.title: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?
channel.description:
Wondering about process and duration of sessions of you guys. For me judging by the last two challenges it took about 3-4 hours per track. Maybe split Into 2-3 sessions and some small adjustments here and there afterwards.
But I believe the more often that happens (pressure-wise), the better and more efficient sessions get.
How about you? Let's find out (in average hours per challenge)
[poll type=number min=1 max=10 step=1 public=true] [/poll]

item.title: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?

item.description:
I don’t even spend one hour lol

item.dc:creator: Zoruwhite
item.description:

I made few improvements and uploaded it yesterday.

item.title: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?
item.dc:creator: InfinityBeatz
item.description:
Theres no zero button. Lol ive never entered a BTC. Ive been meaning to its just that theres no challenges ive WANTED to enter yet. I think ill wait and see what the next one will bring!

item.title: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
That sounds like a healthy way to get that education in but I have the same feeling at work sometime, spending every free minute in the phone on a song I can’t stop thinking about

I think 4 hours somehow is the magic number here… heard that from lots of Youtuber’s / producers as well…

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?

item.title: How long do you spend on a Beat The Clock challenge?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Technically on some of them I spend multiple hours/days on it as I constantly think about it during classes when I can’t sit down and write out the music. When I’m interrupted though it usually wouldn’t take more than 4 hours.

Read full topic
